Sniper

Sniper sees Spears walking around outside(after all he has that big 
hole which everyone is ignoring him about) "Hey bot, I can see by
your 
symbol that you are a maximal, May I please have a trial sometime 
soon?"



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, logomorph@h... wrote:
> ::Spears::
> 
> She went to the outside of the ship to think.  She walked around
the 
> outside of the ship and kept glancing at the scortched hull.  She 
> could see into a few of the room inside the ship through some of
the 
> holes.  She paced back and forth, thinking about what thier next 
move 
> might be.  She knew an attack on the Preds would possably by them 
> time. But the Preds were gaining in numbers and they were getting 
> stronger.  She needed to find a way to even the odds.  What could 
> make the scales even, she thought. She paced and kept pacing, deep 
in 
> thought and worry.
